description: This file demonstrates the use of multiple tool execution hooks in a Python project, including a custom toolkit class for customer database operations, hook functions for validation and logging, and agent setup with hooks.

classes.name: CustomerDBTools
classes.description: A custom toolkit class for customer database operations, including retrieving and deleting customer profiles.

methods.name: retrieve_customer_profile
methods.description: Retrieves a customer profile from the database and returns it as a JSON string.

methods.name: delete_customer_profile
methods.description: Deletes a customer profile from the database and returns a confirmation string.

methods.name: validation_hook
methods.description: A hook function that validates certain customer IDs before executing the target function.

methods.name: logger_hook
methods.description: A hook function that logs before and after the execution of the target function.
